{
  "Allegations" : "CLAIMANT ALLEGES MISREPRESENTATION, UNSUITABILITY AND DAMAGES IN EXCESS OF $500K, ARISING FORM THE PURCHASE OF PRIMARILY LTD PARTNERSHIPS AND HIGH YIELD FUNDS.",

  "Broker Comment" : "WITHOUT ADMITTING LIABILITY, CASE WAS SETTLED FOR $85,000. I WAS NOT NAMED IN THE LAW SUIT. I TRADED HER GM STOCK AND PURCHASED 10,000 OF A PRUDENTIAL BACHE LIMITED PARTNERSHIP. THE ACCOUNT TURNED OUT TO ALREADY BE IN EXISTENCE \"NOT\" PRUDENTIAL BACHE AND THE \"BACHE\" WAS [THIRD PARTY] TO A TOUCH \"CAHRGE\" OF THE ACCOUNT. THE ONLY TRANSACTION I EXECUTED WAS THE ONE 10000 LIMITED PARTNERSHIP."
}
